attributes.action: Stop sending tax payers money out of the uk. Start investing in british industry
attributes.additional_details: Its not rocket science. If we continue to allow money to go out of the country and continue to import and buy from overseas then eventually the pot will run dry.  If the uk government kept pounds in the uk it would help the economy grow, create more jobs and bring the country back.  There is something to be said for always buying products made in the uk if you can find them.
attributes.background: The government complains about its debt and keeps cutting services and the NHS.  Yet the same government allows foreign businesses to take profit out of the country.  The french sell us power and run our garbage collection's, germany makes money on our trains and buses. Keep the pound in thr uk.

rejection.details:
If you would like the Government to exclude companies based outside the UK from tendering for contracts to provide public services, you could start a petition calling for that (although it might not be lawful for the Government to do this).

If you would like the Government to take other steps to increase its investment in British industry, you could start a petition calling for that.
